titleStmt.title: A dialogue bewteene a papist and Protestant applied to the capacity of the vnlearned. Made by G. Gifford, preacher in the towne of Maldon. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed.
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Richard Field, and Felix Kingstone,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A contention between a papist, and a professor of the Gospell.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
